synopsis.text: After returning from an adventure to the Sunken Ruins, Hajime decides to take his companion Miu on one final quest before their journey ends. However, they suddenly find themselves transported to a mysterious, ruined city, separated from their friends. In this devastated landscape, Hajime has a fateful encounter with the Liberators, a group of warriors who were also brought to this city from the past. Though confused about the strange turn of events, Hajime recognizes the need to cooperate with these fighters to find a way back home. Together, they brave the dangers of the ruins and face towering, unnatural creatures reminiscent of the legends of Elysen that Hajime once dismissed. United by the common goal of returning to their worlds, Hajime forms an unlikely alliance, ready to match wits and skill against the arcane perils of this phantom city. Will they unravel the secrets of this realm and reopen the gateway to home? Or does a more miraculous destiny await Hajime and his new comrades? Their phantasmagorical adventure is just beginning...
